decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing powerful aggro creatures like Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply pressure on the opponent. It also includes disruptive elements such as Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to quickly establish a strong board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy, ultimately overwhelming them with aggression and control.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Quantum Riddler and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. It also disrupts the opponent's game plan by utilizing cards like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Consign to Memory to control the board. The deck aims to lock down the opponent's resources with cards like Prismatic Ending and Ephemerate while also generating card advantage with cards like Solitude and No More Lies. The deck's strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and disruption.

This deck aims to quickly assemble the Allosaurus Combo, using cards like Neoform, Eldritch Evolution, and Summoner's Pact to quickly tutor for and play Allosaurus Rider and other key creatures. Once the combo is assembled, the deck looks to win the game through massive creature power and abilities, with cards like Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant and Griselbrand. The deck also includes various support cards like Planar Genesis, Consign to Memory, and Pact of Negation to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It uses cards like Mind Stone, Expedition Map, and Karn, the Great Creator to search for and ramp into powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The control aspect of the deck is emphasized through cards like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and Dismember to deal with threats, while also utilizing cards like Mazemind Tome for card advantage and disruption.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy that aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and strong artifact synergies. By utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mox Opal, the deck can generate significant card advantage and mana acceleration. The inclusion of Urza's Saga allows for additional threats to be quickly deployed, while Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke provide versatile answers to opposing threats. Overall, the deck's key concept lies in leveraging the affinity mechanic to create a powerful and proactive game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing the abilities of Allosaurus Rider and Neoform to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Griselbrand, Atraxa, and Ghalta. It also includes cards like Pact of Negation and Veil of Summer to protect your combo pieces. Eldritch Evolution and Summoner's Pact provide additional ways to search for key cards. The deck aims to win by assembling its combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures. Additionally, cards like Consign to Memory and Planar Genesis provide additional utility and flexibility in different situations.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo of Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a powerful synergy that allows for explosive plays. It also includes powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End for additional threats. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble while using Urza's Saga to tutor for key combo pieces. Additionally, it includes support cards like Vexing Bauble and Soul-Guide Lantern for card advantage and disruption. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and synergistic effects.

This deck focuses on aggressively disrupting the opponent while deploying powerful threats quickly, utilizing a combination of disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push alongside efficient creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Nethergoyf. The deck also takes advantage of the synergies between Eldrazi creatures and cards like Urza's Saga, generating value and pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Pithing Needle and Nihil Spellbomb helps to further disrupt the opponent's game plan, making it difficult for them to stabilize against the deck's aggressive strategy.

This deck revolves around maximizing the value of multicolored creatures and spells, utilizing Leyline of the Guildpact to reduce their costs. The strategy focuses on aggressive creatures like Scion of Draco and Territorial Kavu to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent. Cards like Stubborn Denial and Lightning Bolt provide disruption and removal, while Leyline Binding and Arena of Glory help protect and boost your creatures. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and powerful spells.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on fast, early game aggression with cards like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, backed up by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to finish off opponents quickly. The deck also includes card draw and selection with Expressive Iteration and Preordain, as well as some protection and disruption with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Surgical Extraction. The goal is to apply constant pressure on the opponent while maintaining card advantage and controlling the board.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly assemble the Allosaurus Combo utilizing cards like Allosaurus Rider, Neoform, and Eldritch Evolution. By tutoring for specific creatures and using Nourishing Shoal for extra protection, the deck can potentially win the game in just a few turns. The deck also includes support cards like Pact of Negation and Veil of Summer to protect the combo pieces and disrupt opponents. Xenagos, God of Revels and Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant provide additional power and haste to close out games swiftly. Overall, the deck aims to win through a powerful combo while maintaining control and consistency.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using a combination of creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury alongside burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to apply pressure and finish off opponents. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Mana Tithe and Thraben Charm to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain momentum. With a mix of creature aggression and burn spells, the deck aims to close out games quickly before the opponent can establish a strong board presence.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using UrzaTron lands and Eldrazi Temple to cast powerful eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Thought-Knot Seer. It also utilizes Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opponents' artifacts and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms for board control. Sowing Mycospawn provides additional creature tokens and Kozilek's Command offers versatile removal and card draw. Boseiju, Who Endures protects important spells from countermagic, making it difficult for opponents to disrupt the deck's game plan.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through counterspells and removal spells while drawing cards and generating card advantage. The deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent by utilizing cards like Consult the Star Charts and Wan Shi Tong, Librarian. It includes efficient removal like Fatal Push and Sheoldred's Edict to handle threats, along with the ability to protect its own spells with counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Snare. With a solid mana base and a mix of control elements, this deck aims to grind out victories through attrition and resource management.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to pressure the opponent. It also includes disruption tools such as Mana Tithe and Ranger-Captain of Eos to control the board and protect its threats. The deck aims to maintain board presence and apply consistent pressure to overwhelm the opponent while utilizing cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ocelot Pride to generate value and close out the game efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to generate a large amount of mana quickly through cards like Pyretic Ritual, Manamorphose, and Ruby Medallion. This mana is then used to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames, which allow for card draw and spell recursion. By chaining together spells and utilizing various rituals, the deck aims to create a storm of powerful effects that overwhelm the opponent in a single turn. Additional cards like Wish and Artist's Talent provide extra flexibility and options for the player to achieve victory through explosive combo plays.
